attributes.action: Dicipline the paedritrician who failed to notice a broken back!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am appalled to see today that the doctor who examined the little boy killed by his mother did not notice the state he was in. These doctors get trained and then paid by the British Taxpayer. Why do we employ people who cannot do their job. If a working class person was negligent he would be villified and then sacked. This highly trained doctor is giulty of negligence, and should be sacked.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
